Translations.Text: By the scatterers as they scatter
and by those that bear a burden
by those that course with ease
and by those that apportion the Command
verily what you are promised is true
and truly the judgment shall come to pass
By Heaven possessed of paths
truly you are of differing claims
Whosoever has been turned away shall from it be turned away
Perish those who conjecture
Those who blunder along in a stupor
asking, “When is the Day of Judgment?”
A day when they are tried upon the Fire
Taste your trial! This is what you sought to hasten
Truly the reverent shall be amidst gardens and springs
partaking of that which their Lord has given them. Truly they were virtuous aforetime
Little of the night did they slumber
and ere dawn would seek forgiveness
And in their wealth was a due for the beggar and the deprived
Upon the earth are signs for those possessing certainty
and within your souls. Do you not then behold
And in Heaven is your provision and that which you were promised
So by the Lord of Heaven and earth, it is indeed true—as it is that you are endowed with speech
